text: haneulgwa ttang-eul jinlilo changjoha sim-i geubun-isila geunal geubunkkeseo iss-eola geuleomyeon iss-eul geos-ila hayeoss eumae geubun-ui malsseum-eun jinliimyeo na pal-i buneunnal gwonneung-eun geubunkke issno la geubun-eun neohuiga an-eulo gamchuneun geosgwa bakk-eulo naeboineun geos-eul algo gyesini geubun-eun jihyewa asim-eulo chungmanhasinila
